devdoc.details: A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a cliff and vesting period. Optionally revocable by the owner.

constructor.details: Creates a vesting contract that vests its balance of any ERC20 token to the _beneficiary, gradually in a linear fashion until _start + _duration. By then all of the balance will have vested.

params._beneficiary: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred
params._cliff: duration in seconds of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest
params._duration: duration in seconds of the period in which the tokens will vest
params._revocable: whether the vesting is revocable or not

releasableAmount(address).details: Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested
ERC20 token which is being vested
ERC20 token which is being vested

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

vestedAmount(address).details: Calculates the amount that has already vested.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested

devdoc.title: TokenVesting

revoke(address).notice: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.
